org.araneaframework.http
Interface WindowScrollPositionContext

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardWindowScrollPositionFilterWidget
public interface WindowScrollPositionContext
extends java.io.Serializable

Filter that takes care of saving and restoring the browser window scroll position between requests.

 void reset()
          Resets the scroll coordinates.

reset

public void reset()
Resets the scroll coordinates. Typically it should be called when new flow is started.
